name: Scalable Indexing for Cassandra using DataStax Astra
description: Welcome to the 'Scalable Indexing for Cassandra using DataStax Astra' workshop! In this two-hour workshop, the Developer Advocate team of DataStax will explain the new Storage Attached Indexing (SAI) feature using Astra, the cloud based Cassandra-as-a-Service platform delivered by DataStax, to demonstrate how you can use them to add some much wanted flexibility to your Cassandra data model by querying outside of primary key fields.
